shortDesc:
GIVEN a glossary without a glossary URI
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a phrase with spaces
THEN the system must generate an URI https://base.url/vocab/phrase1-with-spaces.
longDesc:
GIVEN a glossary without a glossary URI
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a phrase with spaces
THEN the system must generate an URI https://base.url/vocab/phrase1-with-spaces.

shortDesc:
GIVEN a glossary with a glossary URI "https://glossary.uri/vocab/#"
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a phrase with spaces
THEN the system must generate an URI https://glossary.uri/vocab/#phrase2-with-spaces.
longDesc:
GIVEN a glossary with a glossary URI "https://glossary.uri/vocab/#"
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a phrase with spaces
THEN the system must generate an URI https://glossary.uri/vocab/#phrase2-with-spaces.

shortDesc:
GIVEN a glossary without a glossary URI
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a single term
THEN the system must generate an URI https://base.url/vocab/term1.
longDesc:
GIVEN a glossary without a glossary URI
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a single term
THEN the system must generate an URI https://base.url/vocab/term1.

shortDesc:
GIVEN a glossary with a glossary URI "https://glossary.uri/vocab/#"
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a single term
THEN the system must generate an URI https://glossary.uri/vocab/#term2.
longDesc:
GIVEN a glossary with a glossary URI "https://glossary.uri/vocab/#"
AND a configuration with a baseUrl "https://base.url/vocab/"
AND a single term
THEN the system must generate an URI https://glossary.uri/vocab/#term2.
